txt.en: 'I have returned from scouting Dâr Mauzur and there are Orcs and the like gathering there in numbers. They seem to be constructing barricades. I know not of their plans, but they must be stopped.'
Destroyed Orkish barriers and defeated foe in Dâr Mauzur.
Bregdal has asked you to defeat foes in Dâr Mauzur and destroy Orkish barriers.
You have done much to dismantle the well-fortified encampment in Dâr Mauzur.
Bregdal, a soldier of Gondor, has scouted Talath Úrui and found a fortified enemy encampment within the sprawling wreckage of Dâr Mauzur.
Destroy Orkish barriers in Dâr Mauzur ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A notice is pinned to the board, signed by Bregdal:\n\n'Part of the Dâr Mauzur encampment in Talath Úrui has barricaded themselves in. A brave adventurer is needed to break down these barricades.'
